string.text: Well, that’s about it…
Step-by-step tutorial.
Alrighty. So, as you are aware, our main goal is to gain control over the Swamps, which means war with the aggressors.
Finally, here you will see the current strategic objective, as well as the tactical missions that you must complete to accomplish the strategic objective.
The completed strategic missions will be shown at the bottom.
This section will show you the full tactical details relating to current combat progress.
On the left-hand side you will see information about your current faction. Right now that’s us, Clear Sky.
On the right you see primary enemy information.
This is an approximate level of our military power.
This shows our troop numbers.
And this is the level of our logistic support.
The symbols shown at the very bottom reflect the distinctive features of our combat equipment.
Similar indicators are displayed for our enemy.
On the last tab you can learn about your current relations with each faction and how they rank in military power.
Your statistics are also displayed here.
Look here. This is the Missions section - your main guide.
In addition to listing tasks, your map will reveal the locations of friendly squads, as well as the coordinates of detected enemies.
This shows your primary mission…
As well as your selected secondary mission.
If you have several secondary missions, scroll through them using these buttons.
Most missions will also be displayed on the map, with rare exceptions when the mission target cannot be located.
We will need your help not only with destroying the enemy, but also in capturing strategic positions.
In a situation like that, our fighters will appreciate it if you provide cover fire while they overrun a position.
By the way, you shouldn’t ignore calls for help - our boys’ lives may depend on your actions.
Hover over a spot on the map to see more detailed information about that location.
